title: OBM Integrative and Complementary Medicine
description: OBM Integrative and Complementary Medicine is an international peer-reviewed Open Access journal published quarterly online by LIDSEN Publishing Inc. It covers all evidence-based scientific studies on integrative, alternative and complementary approaches to improving health and wellness.
sitename: LIDSEN Publishing Inc.The Open Access Publisher
